ENGAGING WITH OUR COMMUNITIES  
Alexion offices around the world engage in numerous community initiatives in their  
respective locales. To align our employee volunteer efforts with our broader philanthropic 
strategy, we developed a formal Global Volunteer Policy in 2019.  
Global Day of Service is Alexion’s annual companywide volunteer campaign. Activities  
in 2019 included transforming teaching and living environments, leading STEM workshops, 
mentoring students, preparing meals, planting gardens, packing hygiene kits and working on a variety of beneficial activities with children, teens, adults and senior citizens.
